thobe.logfileviewer.plugin.source.logstream

Interface ILogStreamAccess

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ILogStream

    public interface ILogStreamAccess
extends ILogStream
    Interface that offers access to the LogStream in the way to register/unregister as listener. Supported listeners: ILogStreamDataListener, ILogStreamStateListener.
    Author:
    Thomas Obenaus
